name: request

scripts.lint: ./node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint.js lib/ *.js

scripts.test: npm run lint && node node_modules/.bin/taper tests/test-*.js
scripts.lint: node node_modules/.bin/eslint lib/ *.js tests/ && echo Lint passed.
